messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: In the confus10n of the crime scene, Officer Jeremy Watkins and Technician Lisa Monroe worked diligently to secure the perimeter. Meanwhile, Detective Mark Brunell took statements from the witnesses, noting particularly the testimony of an individual who saw a man fleeing the scene. Sergeant Eliza Gomez coordinated the efforts of her squad while patrolling the nearby streets for any suspicious activity. Officer Daniel O'Conner reported finding a discarded weapon in a dumpster, which was later confirmed by the lab to be the murder weapon used in the crime. Deputy Ethan Cole arrived to assist in canvassing the area for more evidence. Lieutenant Harper's detailed notes on the case provided valuable insights into the procedural errors made during the initial response. Captain Avery Johnson oversaw the operation, ensuring all protocols were followed after the early mishaps. Coroner Dr. Emily Stanton pronounced the victim deceased at 3:42 pm, and her assistant, Technician Alex Ramirez, prepared the body for transport. Criminalist Jordan Lee analyzed the recovered weapon and managed to lift partial fingerprints, possibly belonging to the suspect.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Officer Jeremy WatkinsOfficer Context: Worked to secure the perimeter at the crime scene.Officer Role: Law Enforcement OfficerOfficer Name: Technician Lisa MonroeOfficer Context: Assisted in securing the perimeter at the crime scene.Officer Role: TechnicianOfficer Name: Detective Mark BrunellOfficer Context: Took statements from witnesses at the crime scene.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Sergeant Eliza GomezOfficer Context: Coordinated the squad's efforts and patrolled nearby streets.Officer Role: SergeantOfficer Name: Officer Daniel O'ConnerOfficer Context: Found a discarded weapon in a dumpster, later confirmed to be the murder weapon.Officer Role: Law Enforcement OfficerOfficer Name: Deputy Ethan ColeOfficer Context: Assisted in canvassing the area for additional evidence.Officer Role: DeputyOfficer Name: Lieutenant HarperOfficer Context: Provided detailed notes on the case with insights into procedural errors.Officer Role: LieutenantOfficer Name: Captain Avery JohnsonOfficer Context: Oversaw the operation and ensured protocol adherence.Officer Role: CaptainOfficer Name: Coroner Dr. Emily StantonOfficer Context: Pronounced the victim deceased and oversaw the preparation for body transport.Officer Role: CoronerOfficer Name: Technician Alex RamirezOfficer Context: Prepared the body for transport under the coroner's supervision.Officer Role: TechnicianOfficer Name: Criminalist Jordan LeeOfficer Context: Analyzed the recovered weapon and lifted partial fingerprints.Officer Role: Criminalist
